column3: na orusu na ɔrobobɔ noho famu reka bɔn wɔ Nyankopɔn ne fi no enyim no
column6: na mbofraba boaboaa hɔn ano baa ne nkyɛn: na ɔman no suu pii."

column3: obi a ofi Elammba mu no
column6: dɛ yɛawarwar mbaa ananaben wɔ asaase do aman mu: naaso afei enyidado bi da ho wɔ hɔ ma Israel."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei wɔmma yɛnye hɛn Nyankopɔn ndzi ahyɛmu dɛ yebeyi yernom no nyinara edzi
column3: na hɔn a wɔawowo hɔn no
column5: na hɔn a hɔn ho popo hɛn Nyankopɔn mbrasɛm ho hɔn apam no tse; na wɔmma wɔnyɛ no dɛ mbrɛ mbra no tse."

column2: "Soɛr; na dwumadzi no da wo do

column5: na Israel nyinara mu etsitsir no kekaa ntam dɛ wobedzi asɛm yi do. Nna wɔkekaa ntam."

column2: "Nna Ezra soɛree fii Nyankopɔn fi no enyim
column3: na ɔkɔr Eliasib ba Jehohanan pia mu: na ɔbaa hɔ no
column5: na ɔannom nsu so: na odzii yaw wɔ ndɔmmumkɔfo no hɔn mbrato no ntsi."

column2: "Na wɔbɔɔ dawur kyimaa Juda na Jerusalɛm nyina kyerɛɛ ndɔmmumkɔfomba no nyinara dɛ wɔmboaboa hɔn ano nkehyia wɔ Jerusalɛm;"
"na obiara a ɔannkɔ ndaansa mu no
column3: dɛ mbrɛ mbapɔmba na amampanyin apam tse no
column5: na ɔnoara so woetu no efi ndɔmmumkɔfo no mu."

column2: "Nna Juda na Benjamin mbarimba nyinara boaboaa hɔn ano kehyiaa Jerusalɛm wɔ ndaansa no mu: ɔyɛ bosoom a otsia akron no ne da a otsia eduonu no mu: na ɔman no nyinara tsenatsenaa Nyankopɔn fi no n'enyim bea tɛtɛr no do hɔ ahopopo mu osian asɛm yi

column6: dɛ wɔdze rema Israel afɔdzi adɔɔ so."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei hom nka hom bɔn nkyerɛ EWURADZE
column4: na wɔnyɛ n'apɛdze; na wɔntsew homho mfi asaase no do amamba no na mbaa ananaben no ho."

column2: "Na mboanofo no nyinara dze ndze kɛse gyee do see dɛ
column3: Dɛ mbrɛ ɔwoara aka no wɔ hɛn ho no
column4: dɛmara so na otwar dɛ yɛyɛ."

column5: nkyii so iyi nnyɛ da kor anaa nda ebien bi edwuma: osiandɛ yɛato mbra kɛsenara wɔ asɛm yi mu."

column2: "Afei ma wonyi hɛn mbapɔmba nsi hɔ mma amamba no nyinara
column3: na wɔmma hɔn a wɔwowɔ hɛn nkurow mu a wɔawarwar mbaa ananaben no nyinara
column6: mber a wɔahyehyɛ mu araa ma onkodu dɛ hɛn Nyankopɔn n'ebufuhyew a ɔwɔ asɛm yi ho befi hɛn do."

column2: "Na Asahel ba Jonatan na Tikeva ba Jahzeia nko soɛree tsiaa asɛm yi: na Mesullam na Levinyi Sabbethai boaa hɔn."
"Na ndɔmmumkɔfomba no yɛɛ dɛm. Na wofii ɔsɔfo Ezra
column3: nye egyanom efiefi etsitsir a wɔwɔ hɔn egyanom efiefi no mu bi
column4: nna wɔbobɔɔ hɔn nyinara hɔn edzin yiyii hɔn sisii nkyɛn; na wɔtsenatsenaa famu wɔ bosoom a otsia du no ne da a odzi kan no mu dɛ wɔrohwehwɛ asɛm no mu."

column2: "Na wɔnye mbarimba a wɔawarwar mbaa ananaben no nyinara wiei
column3: wɔ bosoom a odzi kan no ne da a odzi kan no mu."

column2: "Na wohun asɔfomba mu hɔn a wɔawarwar mbaa ananaben: hɔn nye
"Na wɔdze hɔn nsa maa dɛ wobegyaa hɔn yernom no: na wodzi fɔ ntsi
column3: wɔdze nguankuw mu oguannyin bɔbɔɔ hɔn afɔdzi ho afɔr."

column2: "Na adwontofo no mu; Eliasib: na mbobowano ahwɛfo no mu; Sallum
"Woyinom nyinara wɔawarwar mbaa ananaben: na hɔn mu binom nye hɔn awowo mba
column3: na wɔpaam hɔn nye hɔn mba no nyina ma wɔkɔree."
